solution_line_template: He wants to save ${total_goal_amount}.00 and he has ${left_over_amount}.00 left over so he still needs to save {total_goal_amount}-{left_over_amount}= $<<{total_goal_amount}-{left_over_amount}={money_needed_to_save}.00>>{money_needed_to_save}.00

He wants to save ${money_needed_to_save}.00 over {num_months} months so that means he needs to save {money_needed_to_save}/{num_months} = $<<{money_needed_to_save}/{num_months}={monthly_saving_needed}.00>>{monthly_saving_needed}.00 per month
